name: Slime Cores
description: A shape-shifting, pixel-art, story-rich action adventure metroidvania for PC

name: Ruby's Land
description: Delve into the mysteries of Ruby's Land as a reporter investigating the disappearance of the headmaster after a fire. Explore the park, solve puzzles and uncover the truth behind the disappearances of children. Use a special gadget to survive in this terrifying environment.

name: Trouble of Tabu
description: Take up the challenge and aim your sword to the ground in this true precision platformer. Struggle through the various challenges and try to finish the game in one go.

name: Purgatory Survivors
description: Purgatory Survivors is a top-down shooter with roguelike elements. Plunge into a dark fantasy world infested with demons and despair all fighting for you to fail. Choose your character, primary and secondary guns, and achieve the best synergy with the upgrades to pass the purgatory trial.

name: Something's Not Right
description: Ever gone somewhere and thought "Something's Not Right"? Explore, investigate and experience an ever changing environment. Enter the world and decide if everything is the same or whether something is different. Make your choice carfefully as it may be the last decision you ever make.

name: Onoow
description: TALESCAPE - ONOOW is an escape room game for single player. Explore in the story-rich tales and find out what the truth hidden in the mysterious story. Get items and use or combine them for escape from the story!

name: Starfall: Operation Outro
description: Lead a powerful space battleship and bring victory to humanity in the midst of an endless war.

name: Little Angels
description: Little Angels is a roguelite arena shooter game where various lovely maid-warriors battle waves of enemies and powerful bosses. Upgrade the maid-warriors, choose from a variety of weapons and items to create your own build and protect Earth's peace from enemies!

name: Music Sim Empire
description: Rediscover music history. Bring it back to life and shape it as you envision. Manage your musicians and build an empire. Upgrade your musicians, studios, and rooms. Make interesting decisions, whether you're a casual player or a perfectionist.

name: Sea of Thieves: 2024 Deluxe Bundle
description: Included with the 2024 Deluxe Edition of Sea of Thieves, this bundle contains a wealth of additional content, including a varied assortment of cosmetics, currency to spend at the Outpost shops and access to digital bonus media.

name: One Last Breath: Seeds of Hope Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Baba Yaga's Great Adventure
description: Baba Yaga game

name: Babayka
description: Explode All - From explodes you will get black pieces!

name: Yaga's Hunt
description: There are tales of a dreary forest, where Baba Yaga, a child-hunting witch roams! Some kids don't believe the rumors, and decide to camp out one night as a display of their bravery. Be the one to show them how true those stories really were.

name: Yaga's Candy House
description:
Baba Yaga's house on one leg is home to many mysteries - one of them being the witch's favorite milk candy. Alas, she doesn't like to share, so you must go out on your own to have a taste.

In this thrilling round of Red Light, Green Light (or as we in Poland say, Raz, dwa, trzy... Baba Jaga patrzy!) make sure to grab 3 sweets and run back out of the house
in one piece - so that you hopefully don't end up the old hag's meal!

name: Baba Yaga's cabin
description: Adventure game, based on Slavic mythology and fairy tales.

name: Babushka Baba Yaga
description: Atmospheric text-based adventure game about slavic folklore.

name: Escape Baba Yaga
description: In this game players have to work together to escape the evil baba yaga's house. They have to look for the clues and come up with the final code before the witch catches them.

name: PictoChat
description: Sin descripción

name: Baba Yaga's Cosy House
description: Welcome to Baba Yaga's Cosy House! An entry for the the SA GAME JAM 2023!

name: Escape from Baba Yaga
description: Escape from Baba Yaga is a 2d platformer where you play as Vasilisa the Beautiful, running from Baba Yaga the witch. Along the way, you rescue other children lost in the wilderness. But be careful, if you leave a child behind or are caught with a lost child, the witch will gobble them up!

name: One Night With Baba Yaga: A Gnosis Tale
description:
You are Clara, a young woman desperate to save her family. You've exhausted all options except one: seek the fabled Mother of All Witches, Baba Yaga.

The witch offers to help you... if you can survive a night in her hut. But you won't just have to survive the monsters and miscreants within... you must find Baba Yaga's personal chambers. Only then can you make your case. It is a dire, seemingly hopeless situation...

name: Baba Yaga's Helpmate
description: A small point-and-click adventure about a girl lost in the forest. Baba Yaga agrees to let you stay overnight and lead you out of the forest in exchange for helping out with household chores.

name: The Baba Yaga
description: The Baba Yaga is a PC horror game inspired by the original Slenderman game in which you play as a boy who is looking for his sister in the woods. Upon finding her locked up in a cave, you’ll discover the game’s objective– find the missing keys to save her. As you scour the forest, you will find yourself being followed by a dangerous, looming entity. The monster in this game is based on Slavic folktale about the ogress, Baba Yaga (Baba Jaga), who is known to consume children.

name: Baba Yaga
description: Shamble your way across the Russian countryside as you try to find Baba Yaga a new home. Avoid villager watchtowers, throw flaming jars of oil and medicine, scare off those pesky birds, all while trying to keep yourself stable!

name: Real Bike Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: High School Fighting Game
description: "High School Fighting Game" is all about exciting high school battles in an anime atmosphere. You can play in different ways: Story Mode: Step into an engaging story filled with high school challenges and strong competition. Each choice you make affects your journey to become the best high school fighter.

name: Basketball Strike
description: Sin descripción

name: Wild Mars
description: A sci-fi simulation and survival game. Manage oxygen and energy, make water from ice, resist cold and radiation, grow food, mine minerals, upgrade the machinery in your Mars base just enough to produce enough fuel to return to Earth . Research and combine new elements to improve fuel production.

name: White: Invasion
description: WHITE is a first-person, open-world action-adventure game. As players explore the open world, they discover and repair the destroyed facilities, engage in fast and arcade-like combat with fantastical creatures, and delve into quests.

name: Shrouded Mind
description: Shrouded Mind: pits scientist Kaiser Manger and US Marshal Andre Kar against a deadly virus turning islanders into berserk maniacs. Racing against time, they must find a cure while battling through perilous jungles and uncovering a sinister conspiracy. Will they save the island before it's too late?

name: Piroot
description: Journey to the center of the planet in Piroot, an open world adventure! Explore and survive as a shipwreck's lonely survivor. What secrets lie at the planet's core, and can you trust the voice leading you there?

name: Pitta
description: This story may change because of under development. Story is that thief robot try to steal many things. It is a chase game. You can escape from enemy with various Power up item.

name: Pink Noise
description: "Pink Noise" is a visual novel in the genre of psychological horror in the retro atmosphere of the 90s. Following the tradition of "summer horror", it will tell you a unique story about several teenagers who by chance encounter unknown forces.

name: Outergleam
description: Explore liminal environments, redeem powerful shadow beings, and restore the astral realms as you become a guardian of the afterlife gates. Dive into the unknown and uncover the secrets of the Outergleam.

name: OranguTangle
description: Give your grapple-arm a stretch, gather some friends, and swing towards victory!

name: Night Breaker
description: Venture into an unusual, alien world, full of danger and mysteries, in this sci-fi Metroidvania. Grab your gear and face the challenge of sustaining a once-thriving space colony. Can you bring this place back to life? Are you ready to uncover all secrets lurking in darkness?

name: New Heaven
description: In this first-person shooter (FPS) adventure set in the wake of a devastating meteor shower, players are thrust into the heart of a desperate struggle for survival against hordes of undead monstrosities.

name: New Brooklyn Bridge Tycoon
description: New York City just turned the Brooklyn bridge into a park, and the visitors are in desperate need of food! Now’s your chance to make it big in the Big Apple! Build food booths, grow produce, or locally source ingredients until you're the only competition left in New Brooklyn Bridge Tycoon!

name: Gunbot Diplomacy
description: Splatter slimes, massacre mutants, and assemble your perfect Gunbot! Survive hordes of enemies in this top-down shooter roguelite by customizing your weapons on the unique upgrade grid, and pick from a wide variety of build-defining modules and wacky base bots for a new experience every run.

name: Flipping Legend DX
description: Flip fast or die trying! Flipping Legend DX is a fast-paced action arcade game. It's easy to learn, but takes lightning reflexes to master.

name: Fallen Light
description: Cory wakes up several years into the future, everything has changed and his friends are missing. Complete puzzles, hide from monsters and explore the world around you to try and found what happened and where your friends are.

name: Egg Chef
description: Egg Chef challenges you to cook and deliver eggs for points while avoiding dropping eggs. Play by yourself for a high score or online with friends to see who the best egg chef is. Cook green eggs to earn items for a competitive advantage.

name: Ducking Grenades
description: Ducking Grenades is a physics based game in which the protagonist traverses the world in a very unconventional way: With grenades! Hunt down the evil General Goosey and his minions and bring peace to the universe in this hand-made, fast-paced 2D side-scrolling action game!

name: Disinherited
description: A roguelike 2D platform-action game about catching, throwing, and parrying your way through the Reaper's catacombs. Why? To spite your dead, banking mogul father.

name: Demonica
description: Boomer Twin-Stick Shooter Rogueilike. Swap your weapons and slash to replenish your resources. Learn the enemy's attack patterns and health types, then, determine the best way to slay them based on your current battle status. Every combat encounter is unique in the ever-changing land of DEMONICA.

name: Crystal Nexus: Alien Siege
description: Dive into the strategic depths of "Crystal Nexus: Alien Siege," where the essence of tower defense merges with the ingenuity of deck-building. Operate from a corporate space station, leveraging your wits and a futuristic arsenal to counter a relentless alien threat.

name: Clever Girls
description: Clever Girls is a story-driven, relationship-focused, turn-based DinosauRPG! Outwit poachers with stealth and teamwork while also navigating relationship drama. Explore a mysterious decaying island, defeat overwhelming odds and escape capture.

name: Card Clash Chronicles
description: Embark on a journey across a cool little world, mastering the art of the Card Clash card game. You'll face off against six legendary opponents to earn your ticket to the World Card Game Tournament!

name: Burger Takeout
description: Burger Takeout - a cooperative fast-food simulator. Manage a burger joint, balancing between orders and inventory supplies. For success, raise your rating and keep an eye on finances, adapting to the market. Strategy and teamwork will be significant assets in this dynamic gameplay.

name: Bug Bite Tower Defence
description: Defend on your kitchen counter in this thrilling tower defence meets third-person shooter! Battle waves of insects, from pesky ants to colossal beetles. Earn cash for kills, upgrade weapons, and fortify with powerful turrets. Can you protect the sugar cube?

name: Realmbound
description: Realmbound is an immersive survival, adventure, and action RPG set in a medieval world. Players can build bases, start farms, recruit companions, explore vast environments, clear dungeons, and engage in thrilling combat. With a diverse selection of weapons and tools.

name: Elfscape: Ancestors
description: Elfscape: Ancestors is a story-driven, old-school platformer with RPG elements. Explore a vast underground world centered around an ancient temple city. Jump your way through challenging obstacles, decorate the city, and collect comics pages.

name: Rise
description: R.I.S.E is a cyberpunk action roguelike with intense combat, a focus on strategy, and endless progression. As a gladiator clone you must compete in the ETERNAL CONFLICT, a cycle of dystopian combat and bloodshed for the sake of humanity’s twisted entertainment and sponsored by Mega-Corporations across the galaxy.

name: Card Cultivation: Nine Palaces Illusory Realm
description: "Card Cultivation: Nine Palaces Illusory Realm" is a card-based cultivation survival game. Experience unique cultivation methods like the Nine Palace Flying Stars and the Five Elements within traditional cultural elements. Confront harsh climates and malevolent spirits from ancient texts.

name: Dungeons of Dolkara
description: Dungeons of Dolkara is a 'rogue-like meets souls-like' rpg game following a dwarf and his adventures. Fight for as long as your candle can light your way through the dark caverns under the mountain of Dolkara.

name: Organ Corruption
description: Randomized FPS immersive sim where players make their way through offices and labs to eliminate a series of big pharma CEOs. Synthesize ammunition and body modification from the organs of your enemies to become more powerful.

name: Office Perks: Act 1
description: A game dev's job is never easy, but it's a whole lot better when there are perks everywhere you look! Office Perks is a lighthearted slice-of-life visual novel loaded with playful dialog and lots of opportunites for the more intimate moments in the professional and personal lives of 20-somethings.

name: What Awaits, Aleksey?
description: Utilize your analytical skills to connect the dots and unveil hidden conspiracies! Join the ranks of the People's Intelligence Bureau as a junior cryptologist, decipher cryptic messages and unravel plots brewed up by enemies of the state. Or . . . decide to save them...?

name: Project Silver Shield
description: Hongcaopo,2007, a crime-infested small town in rural China, You are a young police officer at the township police station; you will witness the truth, beauty, falsehood and ugliness while using your strength to maintain peace and bring back the former prosperity.

name: Blood Purge: Releaseburg
description: Survive relentless zombie hordes in this rogue-like shooter. Brace yourself for intense gore and blood in the post-apocalyptic city, where every encounter demands precision and strategy.

name: Neon Grid Defenders
description: Neon Grid Defenders is a sci-fi/Tron theme inspired tower defense game with roguelite elements to make each run unique. Build your path, place your towers, hook them up with unique upgrades and let the enemies have it!

name: Tank Factory Simulator
description: Tank Factory Simulator - you become the new director of the enterprise! Your task is to develop the factory, create new tanks, and ensure their production. Hire workers! Order materials! Create your own versions of heavy military equipment! All of this is available in this game!

name: Furball Blitz!
description: Join adorable animals in epic battles! Choose from 30 unique weapons and team up with friends in fast-paced PvP action. Dominate in Death Match, Team Death Match, and Zone Domination modes. Are you ready for furballs mayhem? Play Furball Blitz! Now!

name: Gravewatch
description: Dive into one of the scariest experiences you will ever get to play! In this horror game, you will get to play as Daniel, a desperate man trying to support his ill daughter by stealing from the dead... however, this time, Daniel will experience hell on earth, as things don't go according to plan...

name: Salvation of Sisyphus
description: In this high-stakes, foddian platformer you can finally find out if Sisyphus is happy after all. Equipped with only your pet rock, suffer trials and tribulations - come out a changed person. Join Sisyphus on his journey to salvation and reach the top together! What awaits him there is incredible...

name: Cafè Manager
description: Design your dream cafe, manage staff, serve a variety of coffees and desserts, and grow your business. Are you ready to brew your way to success?

name: Dark Dive
description: You're a "willing" employee, that got send down into the lower levels to capture the escaped monsters. Proceed through the random generated levels, gather items and find the monster. Good luck surviving!

name: Mythic Crusade
description: Explore, gain resources, expand your town, recruit armies, fight infidels, find new spells, learn skills, and find powerful artifacts. Create your unique build and reclaim the Mythic Holy Land.

name: Primordial Nation
description: Embark on a journey to explore & expand your primordial nation through the ages. Lead it to exploit & exterminate against those who oppose you. This 4X grand strategy game blends immersive city-building & management with dynamic RTS elements.

name: Run Away From Me. Alexandra
description: An action-packed adventure quest with horror elements about Alexandra, who fell into the clutches of a maniac. Your task is to escape from him, completing quests along the way. What ending will you have? Can you choose from the maniac's lair? And who is the real victim in this story?

name: Project 1942
description: Project 1942: Dive into World War II with intense land, sea, and air battles. Teamwork is key in conquest mode. A nostalgic throwback to classic war games.

name: Cluaido
description: A procedural mystery game where you play as the detective to solve a murder case. Find hidden clues, solve logical puzzles and freely interrogate the suspects in a game populated with AI characters who'll answer dynamically to your questions.

name: Game Cafe
description: Game Cafe is a casual game where you can play games like Spades, Okey, Backgammon and more with your friends or other cross platform players.

name: Behind the Kingdom
description: A nonlinear exploration / action game with a huge, seamless & interconnected map, tons of movement upgrades + character customizations, and vibrant pixel art.

name: Unknown Seas
description: Explore the unknown procedurally-generated world of islands and seas. Fight enemies, farm materials, craft equipment, build your base, slay bosses and level up your character. Conquer the unknown with your friends.

name: The Ranger: Origin
description: Your name is Waldo, you lost your parents during Baron Gustav's assault on the kingdom. Thanks to your exceptional skills, you become a Ranger, saving the city from mortal danger.

name: Felampire
description: Felampire is a 2D Metroidvania where you play a vampire cat. Navigate a dark world, absorb powers, solve puzzles, make moral choices, escape the crypt and uncover your past to shape your destiny.

name: Army Troop 2: Modern Guns
description: Army Troop 2: Modern Guns offers intense old-school online PvP battles with customizable soldiers, weapons, and gear. Engage in dynamic combat across diverse maps, with advanced bot integration for non-stop action. Challenge friends or AI opponents for the ultimate FPS experience.

name: Coralium
description: 2.5D adventure game where you are a magical fish who collects polyps (baby corals) to plant pieces of coral reef while exploring the ocean. Powers such as shoot, lunge and electricity are learnt from other fish and obtained to unlock new zones after defeating obstacles on each level.

name: The Vigilante Diaries
description: The Vigilante Diaries is a narrative-driven role-playing game where you assume the role of a masked vigilante. Experience his life journey through his diaries spanning years, navigate the changes within his hideout, and make every decision that shapes his destiny.

name: Telecom Tycoon
description: Build your own mobile network in this unique single-player business simulation game. Start in the 1990s with a 2G network, take part in the 3G auctions of the 2000s and create the best mobile network.

name: Vanlife Camping Simulator
description: Embark on a road trip adventure. Design, customize, and drive your dream van across breathtaking landscapes. Experience the freedom of van life as you choose your path, from serene national parks to bustling city campsites. Manage resources, tackle challenges, and create memories under the stars.

name: Exorkízein
description: Exorkízein is an entity-hunting multiplayer co-op game, immerse yourself in real-life haunted locations replicas as well as folklore entities each with its unique behavior and aspects. Join Theo's paranormal crew in the mission to investigate and capture entities around the world.

name: Slendrina Remake
description: Slendrina Remake is a terrifying survival game set in a dungeon where you must gather items, solve puzzles, and evade the sinister Slendrina herself to make it out alive. Experience the atmosphere of fear and tension in this gripping horror adventure.

name: Unsung Empires: The Cholas II Legacy of Rajendra Chola
description: Take control of Rajendra Chola, and uphold the legacy of your kingdom amidst challenges, battles, and tough decisions in this narrative-driven action-adventure game. Will you honor its heritage or forge a new path? Your leadership will shape the destiny of Thanjavur.

name: Infinikin
description: Your attacks permanently run out in this monster battling randomizer! Find your favorites from a new pool of monsters for every playthrough. Battle efficiently to outpace your losses and unlock upgrades. Cultivate a team across multiple runs, and defeat corrupted Infinikin bosses.

name: Mass Invasion
description: Caught in the middle of an alien invasion, you want to get to your pregnant wife. Craft, build, and fight to survive, alone or with AI companions in this terrifying new open-world survival horror simulator.

name: Sacred Chasm: Silent Utopia
description: A vertical arcade bullet hell with window-breaking mechanics, cute coyotes, JRPG modes, outfit customization, skins, minigames, and a kick-ass soundtrack! Embark on a journey to save the SUNSTONE as Taro and Kiaan, two coyotes from The IMPERIUM, and dodge colorful patterns synced to the music!

name: The Gif Game
description: Unleash your creativity in our multiplayer party game! Use your phone to craft witty prompts, select uproarious GIFs, and cast your vote for the funniest in a laughter-filled showdown.

name: Rich Worker Simulator
description: Move freely around the 100KM² world, work, earn and have fun! Towns, mountains, swimmable lakes, junkyards, gas stations, long roads, farming areas, construction sites and much more. There's a lot of work to be done, a lot of money to be made. Powered by Unreal Engine 5

name: Carnival
description: Carnival is an atmospheric folk horror point-&-click featuring atmospheric low-resolution pixel art graphics, multiple locations drawn from Venice itself, and developing relationships with NPCs, allowing the player to influence events in the game and achieve multiple different endings.

name: Dragenas
description: Dragonfly fairies of the Sacred Swamp rely on the full moon to earn their wings, and insect spirits for their power. With the help of mother sages to guide them, they must rid their world of magic-wielding monsters.

name: Reach Your Destiny
description: Reach Your Destiny is a online game where you fight Machines amutants and humans. Explore, build, survive, and be in a deadly apocalyptic Cyber World. Explore the world and make your own cyberbody !

name: Hollow Stem
description: Murder in a back room? Headless corpses? Disappearing murder weapon? Deadly messages?Murder? Suicide? You want it, it's all here. Let's start from the bloodshed in the Imperial City that shook the nation, pull them out of their cocoons, and get a glimpse of the truth behind them.

name: Asteroid Sentinel
description: Shoot down masses of asteroids and aliens in this arcade-style shooter with roguelike elements. Level up and upgrade your guns to cope with the endless waves being thrown at you.

name: Bastion of Beginnings
description: Dive into Bastion of Beginnings, a replayable tower defense adventure with procedurally generated maps for endless strategy. Battle 4 unique foes, upgrade towers, and adapt to escalating challenges!

name: Basilisk!
description: Basilisk! is a dystopian sci-fi movement shooter where you play as a reanimated cyborg killing machine that is literally powered by pure speed and violence. Parkour, hack, slash, and shoot your way to the center of Complex One, and unplug mankind's new AI overlord, the BASILISK, once and for all.

name: Baluno
description: Baluno is a roguelike deckbuilder where you build stacks of cards in combinations of suits and numbers. Discover unique Wildcards in order to create various synergies and bend the rules of the game to your will, unlocking outrageous score totals!

name: Backpack
description: Draw an item each turn and place it carefully to maximize its power. Engage in battles against a variety of enemies and bosses, using your backpack's contents to overcome them.

name: BabushCats
description: Babushcats is a top-down pixel-art sim game that puts You in the shoes of a grandma managing a shelter for stray cats! From washing and feeding to grooming and pampering, keep those cats content and entertained amidst the chaos. Are You ready for a wild ride of cat antics and endless laughs?

name: Peppa Pig: Laptop Infantil
description: Sin descripción

name: Angkor: The Holy City
description: Angkor: The Holy City is a unique village-builder game about growing a thriving town under the all-seeing eyes of the Gods. Construct intricate temples to honor them and research technologies to counter their wrath, all while expanding your village and contending with an ever-growing population.

name: Airsoft Online
description: Airsoft Online offers a realistic virtual airsoft experience for veterans of the community and beginners alike. Take part in team-based multiplayer battles, with customizable weapons and realistic physics.

name: PJ Masks: Laptop Infantil
description: Sin descripción

name: Affordable Healthcare
description: Affordable Healthcare is the most intense clicker game that you've ever played. Collect money to buy upgrades and defend your body from evil virus' attacks!

name: A Doctor's Term
description: Dr Batten gets in charge of station 11B in the republic's ministry of health. An honourable role where he is about to deal with unimaginable medical cases. The daily work, however, differs from his expectations...

name: Acroflow
description: Dive through dimensions with style in this 3D expressive platformer! Join Acro and Flora on their cosmic quest to reunite and return home. Use their acrobatic abilities to jump, dive and spin through bite-sized arcade platforming challenges set across multiple dream-like realms!

name: 1 Shot 1 Kill
description: Enter the arena of 1 Shot 1 Kill, a game where every shot counts. This adrenaline-pumping 3D arena shooter brings you modern split-screen gaming. With its roots in classic couch co-op and competitive modes, this game promises an unforgettable multiplayer experience, best shared with friends.

name: Zombieland: Survivors
description: A turn-based RPG in an apocalyptic environment made by Unreal Engine 5, players will defeat zombies in levels and collect valuable supplies to equip characters and upgrade the base.

name: Zerra's Adventure
description: Zerra's Adventure is a classic turn-based RPG with no random encounters. Explore diverse areas, collect items and treasures to improve your team and defeat the strangest enemies. Level up, learn new attacks, and meet quirky characters on your adventure!

name: Zero to Death
description: Sin descripción

name: Write Warz
description: Dive into Write Warz, where creativity clashes in thrilling story battles! Craft sentences, vote on favorites, and navigate plot twists in diverse themed worlds. Unleash your imagination in this multiplayer creative writing adventure one sentence at a time.

name: Zooms Rampage
description: zooms rampage is a fast paced movement based multiplayer fps game with randomly selected weapons packed with action

name: Frozen: Laptop Infantil
description: Sin descripción

name: Lightus
description: "Lightus" is an open-world role-playing and simulation game. You will play as a traveler without a "past," embarking on an adventure in the unfamiliar land of "Seofar," exploring lost ruins around the world, searching for lost memories, and creating a new world with other travelers.

name: Magical Girl Paranoids
description: Sin descripción

name: Spellbook Demonslayers NSFW
description: Fight for revenge in SPELLBOOK DEMONSLAYERS - A lethally fast Action Roguelike. Slaughter waves of demons with Weapon-Swapping combos, then Devour their corpses to trigger explosions of demon blood! Fuse weapons to customize their attacks, and slot modifiers into Spells to change their effects!

name: L.O.L. Surprise!: Laptop Tech
description: Sin descripción

name: Justice League: Laptop Infantil
description: Sin descripción

name: Avengers: Laptop Infantil
description: Sin descripción

name: L.O.L. Surprise!: Laptop Divertido
description: Sin descripción

name: Tavern Girl: Expansion Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Sea of Thieves: 2024 Premium Bundle
description: Included with the 2024 Premium Edition of Sea of Thieves, this bundle contains a wealth of additional content, including a varied assortment of cosmetics, a pet, currency to spend at the Outpost shops and access to digital bonus media.

name: NTR RPG Fallen GF
description: Shino has been the protagonist's childhood friend since they were kids. She is like a symbol of a man's "preferences"... A girl with such high specs that anyone would take a second glance if they passed her by. However, everyday life with her doesn't seem to be just peaceful.

name: RangBi
description: RangBi is a rogue-lite autobattler with emphasis on team composition and strategy. Navigate the fragmented hells for a shot at redemption. You must avoid succumbing to the abyss.

name: Bad Blood: 1926
description: 1926, Chicago. The mob has been dabbling in bio-organic experiments and mechanical implants. In this first person shooter, you play as a federal agent tasked with taking them down! Visceral gameplay, mutational genetics and cybernetic enhancements come together in a fresh take on the genre.

name: See The Sky
description:
See the sky is one such story book, a festive-themed Christmas present released for Apple Macintosh in 1992 as a series of HyperCard stacks. In 1996 it was re-released in a remastered form: as an interactive CD-ROM, produced using Macromedia Director, which added ambient music and navigation to the original images. Also released in 1996 was a printed book of the story, presented as 3 images per page. Finally, in 1999 a CD-R of the combined HyperCard stacks was released.

This is a new version of "See the sky" for Playdate, which adds chapter navigation similar to the CD-ROM version.

name: Calum
description: A rhythmic action gameplay inspired by souls-like and beat-in-ups games with a top-down view.

name: Fire Emblem: Tales of Kotor
description: Fire Emblem: Tales of Kotor is a hackrom of Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones, and the sequel to Fire Emblem: Call of the Armor.

name: Fire Emblem: Call of the Armor
description: Fire Emblem: Call of the is a hackrom of Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones. It was built in ~4 months by a team of 14 chapter creators, dubbed Team Distant Roads.

name: Lightning Mobile Unit
description: Sin descripción

name: Birdcage Yard
description: Sin descripción

name: Cat Ball Defense Team
description: Sin descripción

name: Journey to the Center of the Earth
description: Under human destruction, the earth's ecology has been seriously damaged. in 2020, humans began to be alert to such mistakes...but it was too late. So, the United Nations sent an expedition to find a new place to live.

name: Lurking for Love
description:
You’re settling down in a suburban town in Texas, starting a new life for yourself. Lately, your mail has been getting sent to the wrong house and keeps ending up at your neighbor’s front door. Or at least, that’s what he told you.

Your polite neighbor Jacob has been returning your mail quite often lately. It’s almost like he wants to talk to you more...

Lurking For Love is a Horror visual novel game featuring Jacob Alden, a lonesome man who has quite the interest in you.

name: Hamster Life
description: Sin descripción

name: 3D Bowling
description: 3D Bowling is a sport bowling game where you can practice your bowling skill. Aim to get that infamous strike by knocking all of the pins down in one go.

name: Bullet Master
description: Less talk, more bullet! Do you have what it takes to bring down your enemies and make it to the finish line? Run. Shoot. Cover. Take action! Counter the terrorists and break them into pieces!

name: Save Us: Hello Zombie
description: 300+ fun dead levels with more to come for your entertainment. - Play with unique level design and hundreds of entertaining obstacles. - Collect stars by completing levels with minimum ink.

name: Zombie Killing: Call of Killer
description: Zombie Killer is #1 FPS zombie shooter game that combines the timeless appeal of classic action games with crisp graphics!

name: Wild Hunter 3D
description: Aim and Shoot! Wild Hunter offers you the unique game-play that you can hunt wild animals not only on foot but also on a fast moving vehicle!

name: Hunting Safari 3D
description: Hunting Safari is the first mobile game that offers a trip of big-game hunt not only on foot, but also on moving vehicles and even on motorboats in the water.

name: Anime School Girl Parkour 3D
description: Come and participate in the popular Anime School Girl Parkour 3D! In the beautiful cherry blossom campus, put on eye-catching anime costumes, and show off your parkour skills in many cool parkour scenes! Here are a series of props for You are constantly collecting, you can freely dress up your character, break through various obstacles, and sprint at any time!

name: Anime School Girl Parkour Race
description: Anime School Girl Parkour Race is a school-themed simulation game that uses 3D models as its core. In the game, you can not only freely choose a variety of exclusive images, but also make friends from different countries in the game.

name: My High School Games Girl Life
description: Let’s start your role as a high school girl and become a bright student of a high school girl simulator. Wake up early in the morning and get ready for my high school. High school girl games have a variety of missions that will give you the joy of a high school simulator. Make new friends in high school teams and become popular in anime school games. Enter the high school then go to the admin branch to get your student card in high school games. Attend math class and attend quizzes in new high school girl life games. Introduce yourself in front of your class fellow in a free virtual girl simulator.

name: Going Live!
description:
Say hi to your new bias! He's an idol who's been streaming a bit more recently. You're his secret lover, who's a more popular streamer than him! He asks you for help in becoming a more popular streamer. You manage a stan account to keep traction alive and going as well as infiltrate the fanbase to be able to sway their opinions on him!

Will you succeed in making him more popular?

name: School Party Craft
description:
School Party is a cubic style life simulator for schoolchildren and teenagers.
You have a big city at your disposal, in which there are many cute girls and nice boys.
You not only have to hang out and do shopping, but also buy mansions, meet cool characters and even ride the coolest cars!

name: Anime Girls School Life Sim
description: Start exciting and fun campus life, a simulation game about living and learning with town residents and local high school students.

name: KPOP Story: Idol Manager
description: Welcome to the world of KPOP Story! Travel throughout South Korea to recruit talented idols, form idol groups, and top the music charts. Turn trainees into top level celebrities! Create all star groups and see your groups' music alongside the likes of parodies of BTS, EXO, and Red Velvet on the music charts!*

name: Kpop Idol Simulator
description: Kpop Idol Simulator is a simple Kpop simulation game. You can train your character to see what it is going to be after 60 game days. You can collect multiple different ending as how you train your character. Also, you can collect other sundae's items and decorate your room.

name: Hong Gildong-jeon 2
description: Hong Gildong-jeon 2 is an interactive cartoon in the vein of Dragon's Lair and Space Ace.

name: Animal Gem Puzzle
description: Beautiful sparkling animal gem puzzle!

name: LevelMergePuzzle
description:
Can you erase MAX block?

A merge puzzle with great risk and return is born!

Aim for the maximum level by combining blocks of the same level! Get a super high score by erasing MAX. Furthermore, "the score increases dramatically depending on the number of chains up to MAX." When the game is over, the chain rate added to the MAX will also disappear, making every play exciting. When you're in trouble, use Joker to turn things around. The shapes of the blocks are not only circular but also square, so you can enjoy the strategy when stacking them!

name: Animal Away Jam
description:
Animal 3D puzzle that releases animal blocks by tapping!

Move in the direction animal facing. Clear after erasing all.

If you move successfully, coins and treasure boxes will appear!

Collect over 500 rare animals!

Infinite stages!

description: The game has for its goal to introduce you to the basic creatures of slavic mythology. Have fun and good luck!

description: An interesting school simulator that allows you to “Fusion” with 26 different animals. You can also run around the school as an animal itself. When combined with a desk, police car or helicopter ...! ?

name: Lost Nomad
description:
The game takes place in the setting of Turkic mythology in ancient times. The events unfold in the country of Ellir, in the lands of the Turkic blacksmiths, Ordos of the Main character and his tribe.
The main character is a 16-year-old boy named Lachin. One day, a civilization desiring greater power attacked and ravaged his house, for the sake of the riches of the mines of his homeland.
The best and most expensive metals, minerals and stones are mined in the Hellirian Mountains. The region is known for the abundance of magical rocks and the strong connection of the inhabitants of the region with magic and spirits.

name: Fantasy Simulator KnightX
description: The game features a variety of missions and quests that you can undertake, each with its own unique challenges and rewards.

name: Brain Test 2: Tricky Stories
description: Get ready to be bamboozled with all-new mind-twisting puzzles, including scenarios that require you to brain out and face brain test challenges. In this new brain game, puzzles have stories with colorful characters. Defeat the Lion King with Tom the Cat, cultivate your farm with Emily, or hunt monsters with Joe in these engaging brain test games. It is an easy to play, but hard to master game as there are various layers of difficulty with the tricky puzzle system. There are hundreds of story based mind games, IQ puzzles and quiz games. Brain Test 2 is a funny and tricky addition to the puzzle games of the world.

name: Within The Shadows
description: Horror game where you're tasked with simply going to sleep. Ever since you were a kid, you've been gravely afraid of the dark. Because of this, you need to keep the nightlights on in your bedroom and bathroom. You can't quite remember why you've always had this phobia, but you sure don't want to find out again...

name: Orbit Angler
description: Angler is sick of living at the bottom of the sea and wants to see the world, all of it! Spin Angler up to build momentum and then launch straight into orbit, picking up a jetpack along the way.

name: Snowboarders: Kiri Adventures
description: A snowboarding game in which you pick as many coins as you can while doing backflips in the snowy hills. Avoid the rocks!

name: Workboy
description: Sin descripción

name: Neo City Express
description:
Neo City Express is a madcap arcade game about making extremely poor decisions while driving.

You play as Daggers McBlack, the heir to his family's delivery company. Guide him through 6 top-down arcade racing levels, dodging cars and sorting out his personal affairs. In order to take the company to new heights, Daggers will push himself to questionable limits. But he's traveling with the loving memory of his grandma, so perhaps with her guidance everything will turn out alright.

name: Besitupia
description: Waking up in a mysterious bunker, you realize that you've ended up on a planet full of mysteries and dangers. Use your skills and intuition to overcome obstacles and escape to freedom.

name: Open School World
description: This game is Open School World. The game takes place in the open fictional small world "Sakura Town". We designed the game scene to feel like you are in a hybrid world, and as a student, you can experience a simulated high school day-to-day life. This game is not an action and shooting game etc, but a simulator. There is no end to this game. Make situations to your liking and find your favorite way to play. We hope you will like this game. You can talk to students and others, make friends and lovers through simulations, attend school classes, buy things for yourself or give away, and more. Enjoy her busy days. Go to class, listen to your favorite lectures, take your favorite physical education classes. The controls of this game are super easy and fun to make fun of your friends and hug them like you did in high school. Bring back the old school days in your life. You can talk, take classes and take pictures. This game provides challenges, is super fun, and will help ease your boredom on your real campus. Different days will bring you new tasks so you will never get bored. Anime High School Simulator takes you on a journey full of fun, drama and adventure. Allows you to enjoy school life as a student or again as a student, free to love, drive, play, and enjoy life. Stunning levels and high-quality 3D graphics of school life, different missions will bring you the fun of adventure in anime high school life simulation. Enjoy adventure as an anime schoolgirl and take on all the tough challenging missions of school life.

name: High School Girl Life Sim 3D
description: High School Simulator is a new and exciting high School life game where the user would play as High School anime girl. This high school game has variety of missions which will give you the real joy of simulator games as the user is supposed to perform multiple task and experience the life of a real world school girl. In this girls game make new friends and become a popular girl in high school class, so find new friends to make your day memorable in your life.

name: Sprill: Aqua Adventures
description: Sprill: Aqua Adventures is a puzzle game featuring a fox called Sprill who inside his automated bubble (which can be rotated) is trying to find buried treasure at the bottom of the sea.

name: Triple Laser RPG
description: Based on the titular chamber from Portal 2, Triple Laser RPG explores the testing elements of Aperture Science as lighthearted characters in a short story about solving this seemingly impossible test chamber.

name: The Ritual
description:
Warning: this is not a happy game.

Princess Valerie is being escorted by her knight through the woods and to the site of an ancient ritual that the princess must perform to bring prosperity back to her kingdom.

Follow the two women on their journey, choose what they discuss, and take your time to examine their innermost thoughts.

They only have a more few days together before the ritual.

This is a text game made in Twine for Yuri Jam 2017. It takes around 30 minutes to play through.

name: Lost Fragment
description: Survival Horror game made in Unreal Engine 5

name: Joke, Please
description: A game in which you find out personal information about your customers so you make a machine generate a good joke for them.

name: Legend of Hero Tonma
description: A canceled port of Irem's arcade game.

name: SCP: Infohazard
description: SCP: Infohazard is a survival horror game based on the stories of the SCP Foundation, where you take on the role of a test subject who becomes the survivor or a reality-bending disaster. To survive, you must restore reality fragments around the facility while avoiding some of the most dangerous monsters and anomalies that they contain. You must navigate through the high-tech facility and to find a way to stop what might just be an end-of-the-world scenario. SCP: Infohazard immerses you in the inner workings of The SCP Foundation like never before, with breathtaking details, clever puzzles, heart-pounding stealth, combat, and more. Use the environment to your advantage as you avoid detection, shoot around corners, distract the monstrous anomalies, and more.

name: Murder Scheme
description: Get together with your friends for an exciting murder mystery game experience! With a group of up to 12, you'll have a blast testing your wits and strategy. Join now for fun!

name: Chikaro
description: A boy and an android girl wake up without their memories in a world where deadly robots roam the streets. With the boy's powers, they can leave their bodies to walk through walls or possess enemies. The two follow the trail of the intentions left behind by those who once perished above the ground.

name: Oyster Wars
description: Serve your own justice. In a world where the rich step on the poor without consequence, Wade ventures to the private island of a ruthless CEO for revenge. Help Wade use his hook shot to clear gaps, grab items and find secrets in this 2D pixel platformer. Will you stand up against the powers that be?

name: Shoot or Shout
description: Experience the thrill of roguelite action in Shoot or Shout! Team up, shoot or shout at wacky enemies, and face unique bosses across dimensions. Navigate pre-designed levels in this pixel-art adventure packed with action and strategy!

name: AO: Containment Breach
description: AO: Containment Breach is a Procedurally Generated, Level Building, Semi-Auto-Battling, Rouge-lite, Horror hybrid. Fight and Contain AOs as you travel through the Terra AO facility. During "Dives" scavenge for Materials to Craft unique Weapons, and Upgrades.

name: Railway Life
description: Travel the forgotten railways on your little steam train in this charming slice-of-life adventure game, where you explore the fields, towns, mountains and beaches of a small British island and help turn it into a thriving community.

name: Star Fetus
description: Star fetus is a dynamic shooter with elements of fist fighting, you hit physical attacks that help accumulate aura to use abilities in battles with various bosses and enemies in random locations

name: MonoRace
description: MonoRace is a cheerful monobike racing where you can explore tracks and get points by performing tricks. Try the game in VR and PC versions with unique controls.

name: Mortal Holdings
description: In this macabre clicker, help Shoggoth keep his Mortal Holdings human farm in good standing among the monsters of Innsmouth.

name: Sixth Sun
description: Sixth Sun is a challenging and methodical 2D action game set in an alternate 1500s Mexico. Explore diverse and deadly areas, face terrible foes and gain new alliances to uncover and put an end to the malefactors’ plan.

name: Whispers Of Sylvan Grove
description: An adult pixel art open-world fantasy RPG that follows the journey of Willow, a 19-year-old fawn girl and the last of her kind, navigating a once-thriving forest now invaded by humans. Forge bonds and bring harmony back to a world on the brink of imbalance.

name: Atomic Bot: Survivor of Planets
description: Collect all the weapons and free the planets from evil clones!

name: Nightlife: Vista
description: Build your own nightlife empire! Build your venue, decorate it with care, attract talented DJs and boost your popularity with special events. Compete with competitors, solve crises, interact on social media. Make fast and strategic decisions to develop your club and become the ruler of nightlife!

name: P4st3l
description: Pastel is an FPS horror game where you experience a beautiful liminal space and sub-mechanophobia towards underwater and above-water objects.

name: Beware of Light
description: Beware of Light is a «hard sci-fi» city-building game focused on narrative and survival. After an unexpected crash landing on a dead world, as the new Captain, you must manage colony infrastructure and manpower. Can you thrive under the scorching sun? Will this planet become your grave or salvation?

name: Slayer Knight
description: You are the Knight called upon to explore the depths of these ravaged Lands. With speed, precision, and the swing of your sword, you can conquer the scourge of the Ancients and become the Slayer Knight.

name: Starxia
description: Starxia is an old-fashioned side-scrolling space shooter. Step into the role of a Pilot and use your ship to eliminate hordes of fierce enemies. A compelling story and many interesting characters await you in this adventure. Take over the controls and fly into the vacuum of space. Let the hunt begin

name: You Are Horny
description: Navigate life as a shy guy given a magic pill by a friend to fix romance woes. Meet women, tackle pill side effects, and aid your buddy in love dilemmas. A comedic journey of love and friendship awaits!

name: Sounds of War
description: Experience the action! Sounds of War delivers intense 5v5 battles across modes like Capture The Flag and Free for All. Customize weapons, rank up, and become the ultimate warrior. Join a clan, challenge friends, and dominate the battlefield. Warfare redefined!

name: Sacred Forest
description: Embark on an open world adventure in Sacred Forest! Play as a pixel art heroine, master slow-mo archery, glide with your cape, and swing with grapple arrows. Battle blight-infected monsters, undertake epic quests, and restore balance to the forest!

name: Night Shift Dissonance
description: Identify Clients, find out what they want, and deliver items in a timely manner. If you make it to the end of the week you won't live to see another day of work!

name: Apex Automata
description: Get ready for an epic showdown against rebel machines in Android Resistance, a frenetic top-down shooter that challenges your skills and strategy. Take on the role of Adrian-317, the wise Vanguard, and assemble a diverse team of androids, each with their unique abilities.

name: Soul Return
description: Help a little soul go through a unique and wonderful world. Explore the area, solve puzzles, find scraps of memories to help the hero reunite with his family and find out why Death didn't come for him.

name: Memories of Misery
description: Memories of Misery is a cooperative puzzle game, where you work together to escape your mother's grasp. Make your way through unique rooms with a variety of escape-room style puzzles all of which are connected to the mystery behind the origin of your family.

name: Thanks Merlin
description: Thanks Merlin is an adventure horror game where the main goal is to survive. You find yourself in a closed toy store under the control of a giant toy - Chummy Tummy. With a flashlight and a laser gun, you must find a way out of the maze of horror by solving puzzles created by the inventor Merlin.

name: Sacred X: Heavens Wonderland
description: Sacred X: Heavens Wonderland is a unique Eastern fantasy open world MMORPG! The game has a large seamless map of more than 60,000 square kilometers. You will embark on a thrilling free adventure in this world full of swords and magic!

name: Cubieverse
description: Sin descripción

name: Candy Ship
description: You will control a candy spaceship in the shape of a whale as it navigates through the Candy Universe. Its goal is to reach the distant Candy Planet! Your spaceship will collect candy meteorites in space and convert them into fuel, enabling a journey lasting over 400 years.

name: XX Delicto
description: Velocity battles to save her princess in XX Delicto, a voluptuous post-apocalyptic whack-n-slash.

name: Babsi Bullet
description: You’re a bullet... so you won’t need guns to fight evil alien hordes in this non-linear action and puzzle platformer.

name: VanySlash
description: Heroine, a close-combat magic-user, and her partner, an axe to fight and collect magical Tools!

name: Quiz Racer
description: Quiz Racer is a zero-gravity racing game. You'll speed through diverse and procedurally generated environments, avoiding obstacles and crashing through questions. Get ready to learn... or die trying!

name: Thule
description: A turn-based 4X strategy game set in a dark fantasy world. Engage in the dynamic conflict as one of five factions vying for supremacy over Thule through both randomly generated worlds and diverse missions.

name: Pyxole
description: "Pyxole" is a vibrant pixel art creation and exploration game where players craft characters and worlds, sharing their masterpieces in a community-driven universe. Dive into a realm where creativity meets collaboration, bringing to life endless possibilities in pixel art form.

name: Buggy Derby Arena
description: Buggy Derby Arena is an exhilarating game that puts you in the driver's seat of a powerful buggy, fighting for survival in a closed stadium.

name: Last Call
description: In Last Call, a roguelike horror experience, survive randomized floors, choose perks in elevators, and master 12 levels to escape via helicopter. Unreal Engine 5's Bodycam delivers immersive realism against varied enemies. Every decision counts in this relentless fight for survival.

name: Donkey Kong Parking Attendant Arcade Game
description: Sin descripción

name: D.K.R. DMG
description: In an internal Rare document of games that were to be shown at E3 1998, one listing is for D.K.R. DMG, with D.K.R. likely standing for Diddy Kong Racing and DMG referring to the Game Boy. The game was never publicly shown.

name: Deep Dark Wood
description: “You´re now at the Main Crossroads. There are seven paths leading from here into the Deep Dark Wood. Each path is a separate micro game written by a student from Senica, Slovakia as an answer to an open call for entries with common starting point - in the middle of a forest.”

name: Shadow Among Nove
description: In a remote corner of space lies an old ship with no engines nor power. In its dark cabin with no lights on, a brown-haired bounty hunter is watching the news about a high bounty on offer, unaware that someone is infiltrating his ship. Under the threat of a cold gun, a journey of suspicion and uncertainty begins.

name: Shadow Code: Lucy
description: Become a hacker, utilizing your skills to collaborate with the mysterious master thief - Lucy, to accomplish a sensational heist.

name: Shanghai Gold
description: A boomer shooter set in 1930's Shanghai. Fight your way through Shanghai and greater regions of China, in search of treasure and adventure.

name: Sedecktion
description: SeDECKtion is the first TCG where strategy meets seduction!Compete for attention and match traits and preferences of Characters to win.The game is under development.Please, share your feedback and questions about this brave game concept.

name: Salto Mortadella
description: Brave Salto Mortadella's perilous heights! Navigate treacherous platforms, precarious ledges, and perilous jumps. A misstep means tumbling down. The stakes are high in this thrilling platforming adventure!

name: RPGirl
description: Explore a cute '90s console RPG from the inside out as marooned cosmic magical girl, Mack. Battle and befriend an adorable menagerie of beasties via turn-based combat and personalized story sequences. Power up, pummel bosses, redesign dungeons, and hatch an escape plan from this game-within-a-game.

name: Rova
description: A Cosy Space-Rover Simulator.

name: Rocket Engineer
description: Rocket Engineer is a simulation game about designing, testing and launching your rockets to explore. Rocket Engineer focuses on the engineering aspect of rockets, while allowing a fun exploration experience.

name: Rise of the Outcast Hero
description: Embark on a crazy journey as an amnesiac protagonist caught in a war between humans and demihumans...Solve their problems while you fuck and breed every single female demihuman alive, including orcs, elfs, dragon-kin and many others.

name: Res Extensa
description: A platform adventure game incorporating elements from immersive sims and cinematic platformers. Run, fight and hack your way through a distant space colony as you attempt to reclaim your humanity.

name: Psychological Hacker 2044
description: 「Psychological Hacker」is a turn-based combat game featuring HD-2D pixel visual style. Explore the inner worlds of others, gain their cognitive experiences and secrets, and uncover the hidden mysteries in this city.

name: Psycho-Kin
description: Psycho-Kin is a top-down shooter in which you control two characters. Strategically navigate through levels, deciphering the order to eliminate targets. Unravel the mysteries of a retired soldier's past, endowed with a unique psychic ability.

name: Project Genome
description: Project Genome is a non-linear Adult Furry Visual Novel with an Open-world Map, Turn-based Combat, and Roguelite mode. Help the main character May Rotokowski write the greatest article about her discoveries on an ancient island full of furry creatures and sci-fi human-created machines.

name: Project Blind
description: Project Blind is an online multiplayer thriller, where you must outsmart others to break free from a sinister realm. Compete head-to-head with friends or foes online as you navigate through the shadows and strive to uncover the path to freedom! Talk with your opponents with a proximity chat!

name: Project A10
description: Meet Project A10! In this exciting Co-op game that combines the Roguelite and FPS-Shooter genres, you're in control of challenging your enemies to collect valuable currency and strengthen yourself.

name: Project0
description: Step into the dangerous world of Project0. Your mission is straightforward, follow The Agency's orders and then escape in one piece. Whether you prefer solo play or a cooperative mode for up to 4 players, our semi-procedurally generated world ensures each gameplay is a unique experience.

name: Projekt: Passion - Season 2
description: Continue the story of Projekt: Passion. Now with EVEN MORE sex, comedy, sex, and all those things that everyone loves. Continue your fun-filled space adventure and continue developing your relationships with the girls you've come to know and love.

name: Phantom Stars
description: A Visual Novel of an investigating-dating idols: “When a new police officer has to go undercover as an 'idol group leader' to solve a case.”

name: Phantom Girls: Hellish Hospital
description: Immerse yourself in "Phantom Girls: Hellish Hospital", an adult FPS horror game where sensuality meets horror. Make your way through explicit scenes and supernatural phenomena as you immerse yourself in a story of fear and love.

name: Penta Terra
description: An enchanting fantasy colony simulator where the world comes alive through intricate simulation.

name: Peach Hills Division
description: An erotic point-and-click adventure game blending paranormal fantasy with military intrigue. Woo your squadmates, collect clues, and uncover the secrets of the Peach Hills Division!

name: Pawn Shop Simulator
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure in "Pawn Shop - Storage Auction". Restore treasures, outbid rivals, and build your pawn empire in this addictive simulation game. With a mix of pawn, auction, and storage war elements, the excitement never ends. Will you become the ultimate pawn mogul?

name: One Fenix Down
description: A retro-inspired, classic turn-based RPG for those with nostalgia for the '90s golden era. Explore a vast world with 14 playable characters, fight hundreds of unique enemies, and delve into an epic story of war, betrayal, and redemption.

name: NoSleep: Nightmare Chronicles
description: Embark on a an unforgettable narrative journey with NoSleep: Nightmare Chronicles, a chilling collection of interactive horror stories from the r/NoSleep subreddit. Explore immersive environments, face grotesque encounters, and fight to survive in this gripping anthology of terror.

name: Neural Synapse
description: Become a bounty hunter in a cyberpunk city of the future. Explore neon streets, talk to people, hack into corporations. Use all your skills to survive and become a hero.

name: Neonexus Wars
description: Dive into the cyberpunk world of Neonexus Wars, where you'll navigate treacherous sectors as a Nexus Runner. Craft your deck, tackle challenging runs, and face off against powerful foes in this roguelike deckbuilder. Can you survive the Neonexus?

name: My Lewd OS
description: My Lewd OS: You've just downloaded the FREE-TO-PLAY UwU-OS, the world's lewdest hacking operating system! To encourage the best hackers, UwU-OS realized that the best encouragement is consequences. As you become a hacking master & your skills grow, so too does your photo collection!

name: Mech x Change
description: You play as a mech pilot, tasked with demonstrating the newest weapons, at a futuristic arms fair. The enemy and player tear off weapons from each other's bodies mid-fight, forcing you to quickly adopt new strategies, while impressing buyers.

name: Mecharise
description: Mecharise is a strategy and tower defense game that combines elements of base building, resource management, and wave-based combat against hostile aliens. Pilot a mecha as you colonize new worlds and defend your base against enemy attacks.

name: Manly Mines
description: 1-4 player bodybuilding co-op survival horror. Collect loot to sell for food and supplements in order to beef up to tackle the mighty testing gates.

name: MagicCar of Delicious
description: In a game blending combat, strategy, and cooking, players battle the Dark Eater Cult with a magical chariot. They collect resources, fight monsters, and upgrade their chariot. Cooking enhances abilities. The journey leads to a final showdown with the cult leader in a world of challenges and cuisine.

name: Lucha Masters: Mighty Lucha
description: Lucha Masters: Mighty Lucha is an action game in which four players can immerse themselves in frenetic battles, defeating their opponents with all the folklore of mexican Lucha Libre always having a champion.

name: Fun with Ragdolls Plus
description: Embark on an epic and fun platforming adventure with ragdoll physics. Create worlds and stories or follow Danny and Rickie's journey through the world of ragdolls, uncovering the dark truth it holds.

name: Flora & Fauna
description: Discover the magical maidens of Flora & Fauna and find out if the women of Alorea will give their bodies to science!

name: Guild Battalion
description: Command your group in this medieval fantasy CRPG and unveil the story as you explore dungeons, defend fortresses, protect payloads other different stage objectives!

Never Alone 2 is being developed using an Inclusive Development process with the Alaska Native community. It tells an original story from an award-winning Iñupiaq writer and draws from tradition and stories that have been shared across generations. Designed to be played co-op (online and couch), Never Alone 2 invites you to explore environments ranging from the harsh frozen tundra to forest valleys filled with ancient willows as you traverse beautifully realized landscapes that are filled with wonder. Together you will work to navigate these wilds, forge connections with the spirits, and experience how the Alaska Native people have survived and thrived for over 10,000 years in one of the harshest and most breathtaking parts of the world.

We designed the game scene to feel like you are in a hybrid world, and as a student, you can experience a simulated high school day-to-day life. This game is not an action and shooting game etc, but a simulator.

You are Sakura, a 16 year old student who recently moved, you have only 1 friend. You are capable of doing anything for your senpai.
Kill everyone that comes close to your senpai.

description: Race, crash, and battle for supremacy in "Crashing Not Optional"! Short, intense races on treacherous tracks filled with obstacles. Nostalgic couch gaming with up to 4 friends. Who will emerge victorious?

description: Will you unearth the war's secrets, or will your ideals be put to the sword? As Laelynn travels across Eirea, a mystical journey of tactical warfare and strategy unfolds. Old school strategy RPG with a modern flair awaits!

The player has to deal with lack of resources, equip controlled drones, fight insidious enemies and survive harsh environments with extreme conditions.

The possibilities for ropes are endless, from carrying objects, to bouncing balls, to tying up and defeating enemies! Overcome with him the many difficulties that await you!

name: PixelZen
